name: Cocoon (Mahjoub, Yulfan, Cyrolis)
description:
----- Game made for Global Game Jam 2019 -----
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/cocoon

This Game is about a boy who want to escape from his family routine, that's why every night he stole some objects which he like to create his own space in the house.

Goal

Explore the house, retrieve the 8 yellow items (one by one) and bring them back to your hideout. Do not get caught by the shadows... heu, your parents. 

Controls

Gamepad and Mouse & KeyBoard supported (QWERTY // AZERTY)

We recommend using a Gamepad.

Navigation in Menu

Left stick for navigation,  Click or A for validation. 
Bug: If you using a mouse, deselection with right clik before clicking other options.

Navigation in Game 

LT or Click for interaction with items. 
Start or Esc for Pausing the game.

Hint : In the hideout, aim the exit on the right and use LT to go out.
